page.title: 07St. Thomas' Church History
page.content: St. Thomas'church was built in 1843 but the church register goes back to 1842 ! The foundations for its erection were not got out until late in the year 1842 or early in 1843.The first incumbent was the reverend.R.Goldham , who retained the living until 1845.His first entry in the burial register was that of Sammuel Colcough,November 27,1842, before the ground was consecrated.His first entry in the birth register was on October 16 1842 viz, that of Joseph, son of John and Mary Beresford who was probably christened at his home.
